author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ringcentral, Inc. Announces Pricing Of $400 Million 0% Coupon Convertible Senior Notes Offering
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Ringcentral Inc:
* RINGCENTRAL, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $400 MILLION 0% COUPON CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES OFFERING
* ‍PRICED $400 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 0% COUPON CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​
* ‍OFFERING OF NOTES WAS UPSIZED FROM ORIGINALLY ANNOUNCED AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF $350 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
